article_title: Obamacare's Shift To Value Hits Hospital Admissions

article_metadata.description: Hospital admissions, which rose last year for the first time in seven years, may dip again as penalties under the Affordable Care Act for poor quality care push medical-care providers to improve and keep people out of the hospital.
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Hospital admissions, which rose last year for the first time in seven years, may dip again as penalties under the Affordable Care Act for poor quality care push medical-care providers to improve and keep people out of the hospital.
